job_tasks.justification: Writing, testing, and refactoring code are fundamental software development activities.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a strategic goal of modernizing products, which requires understanding the business context.

job_tasks.justification: This describes a high-level business impact and strategic vision for the product line.

soft_skills.phrase: eager to use AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions
navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions
proven to be the best predictor of success in roles that require rapidly gaining and applying new knowledge.
collaborating with AI to diagnose and solve problems

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, development, and deployment of applications leveraging generative AI, specifically mentioning RAG, GPT-4, and other generative AI techniques. The core responsibilities involve building user-facing features and integrating these AI capabilities into existing product lines, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
